  • org.zssn.escaperoom.Game
    Modifier and Type
    Constant Field
    Value
    public final String
    HELP
    "The commands are:\n\u00b7 <direction> : allows face a specified direction given the cardinal points; it can be either \"north\" or \"n\"\n\u00b7 cross <direction> : allows to cross in a specified direction; if <direction> argument is omitted, then the player crosses the current facing direction\n\u00b7 look : returns a list of the items in the current room\n\u00b7 inventory : shows the items in the player\'s inventory\n\u00b7 take <item> : allows to pick an item in the facing wall given it\'s name as argument\n\u00b7 use <item> : allows to use an item in the inventory or in the facing wall\n\u00b7 status : give the status of the player, in particular it returns the health of the player and the items in the inventory\n\u00b7 undo/back : goes back of a move in the game\n\u00b7 save : save the current state of the game\n\u00b7 quit/exit : exit the game without saving the changes\n"
